items.value: %113% has discovered that a %111% named %00@ will soon leave %04@ to explore %14@.
%113% took the guise of a wandering merchant and started a conversation with %00@. He managed to dissuade %00@ from leaving by telling tales of fearsome beasts roaming outside.

%113% took the guise of a wandering merchant and started a conversation with %00@. He attempted to dissuade %00@ from leaving by telling tales of fearsome beasts roaming outside but %00@ instead appeared to be more excited by the stories. It looks like we can no longer stop him from moving.
%113% failed to stop %00@ from leaving to %14@.
